name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John HANCHARIK, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John HANCHARIK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Leonard I. Sharon, Pittsburgh, for appellant. .
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 204
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John HANCHARIK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 24, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Leonard I. Sharon, Pittsburgh, for appellant. .
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
